issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Download the latest Blackberry titanium sdk.
2.Set the titanium sdk path to the blackberry titanium sdk downloaded.
3.You will see that the studio dos not detect the blackberry titanium sdk.

Expected Results:
1. Studio should detect the titanium blackberry sdk.

Actual results:
1.Studio does not detect the titanium blackberry sdk.
fields.summary: Blackberry : Titanium studio does not detect blackberry titanum sdk when we add path in studio for win 8
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 3.0.0.201211191701
blackberry 10 simulator
Blackberry 10 sdk
windows 8

comments.body:
The blackberry sdk is getting detected.Thus closing the issue.
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201212191959
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130114171802
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386
